content: Create documentation directory and detailed implementation plan
Analyze current output/logging patterns in proxymock codebase
Add LogWriter field to Settings struct in run.go
Add --log-to flag to CLI command definition
Update println method to use LogWriter instead of fmt.Println
Update configureLoggers to use LogWriter for all logger output
Find and update all direct fmt.Print* calls to use LogWriter
Test implementation using --health-port to validate log redirection
